items.title: Want to Buy a Quantum Computing Stock in 2025? You Might Consider This Quantum Computing ETF.
items.description: Defiance Quantum ETF returned 60.4% over the last year through Jan. 3 -- just over double the S&P 500 Index's 28.1% return.

items.title: Horizon Media Holdings appoints former IBM exec as first president
items.description: Bob Lord previously served as IBM’s first chief digital officer and is now tasked with overseeing the alignment of Horizon’s growing portfolio.
